footer.chaynDescription: Bloom aapke liye Chayn dwara laya gaya hai, jo ek veshvik non-profit sanstha hai, jise duniya bhar ke survivors aur samarthak chalate hai. Vo ling-adharit hinsa se guzre hue logon ki healing ke liye sansadhan banate hain.

404.title: 404 - Page nahi mila
404.authenticatedDescription: Yeh page nahi mila. URL ko check karein ya courses ke page par vapis jayen.
404.unauthenticatedDescription: Yeh page nahi mila. URL check kariya ya fir welcome page par vapis jaiye
404.authenticatedRedirectButton: Courses ke page par vapis jaiye

500.title: 500 - Internal error
500.description: Hmm, kuch galat hogaya. Kripya vapis jaiye aur dobara prayas kariye. Humse contact form ke dwara sampark kariye agar yeh error baar baar aa raha hai toh.
500.authenticatedRedirectButton: Courses ke page par vapis jaiye.

alt.bloomBumbleLogo: Bloom ki partnership Badoo logo ke saath
alt.bloomBadooLogo: Bloom ki partnership Badoo logo ke saath
alt.bloomHead: ek vyakti ke chehre aur kandho ka chitra hai, jiske upar bade patte aur fool khile hue hain
alt.leafMix: Illustration of two leaves joined with a rose
alt.leafMixBee: Illustration of two leaves with a bee hovering above
alt.leafMixDots: Illustration of 3 leaves with a flower in the middle, and dots shooting from the flower.
alt.personTea: Chai pakde baithe vyakti ka chitran
alt.chooseTherapist: Illustration of a side profile of a person's face, with a flower
alt.dateSelector: Illustration of a calendar with a heart in the middle
alt.change: Ek chakra ka chitran - ke chakra mein teen sooraj unke beech mein teer.
alt.confidential: Illustration of a document with a lock in the corner
alt.cookieCat: Chitra mein ek billi araam kar rahi hai ek biscuit ke saath.
alt.bloomFruitzLogo: Bloom ki partnership Fruitz logo ke saath

cookieConsent.cookieConsentExplainer: Kripya analytics cookies ki anumati dein taki hum Bloom mein sudhaar kar sakein. Humare mein aur padein.

signUpTodayPromo.title: Sign up for a free account today
signUpTodayPromo.description1: We provide free services to support you to heal from trauma. From our video courses and reflective activities to our 1-1 chat and WhatsApp subscription service, there's lots of different ways to engage with Bloom.
signUpTodayPromo.description2: Sign up today to get access to all of our content and explore everything Bloom has to offer!
